1275.question: what are the state of the art methods?
1275.response: {'Answer': 'Some of the state-of-the-art methods include LSTM, Joint-LSTM unidirectional, S2VT [23], -RGB (VGG), -RGB (VGG) + Flow (AlexNet), LSTM-E (VGG) [15], LSTM-E (C3D) [15], Yao et al. [32], and Joint-BiLSTM reinforced.'}
1275.answer: S2VT, RGB (VGG), RGB (VGG)+Flow (AlexNet), LSTM-E (VGG), LSTM-E (C3D) and Yao et al.
